ygData.subject: Re: Demon's claw
ygData.msgSnippet: As always, J.M Capozzi s advice is very sound.  One thing though, barbed leather whips just cannot be bought for 50 plat anymore.  Neither can Polished Granite
ygData.messageBody:
As always, J.M Capozzi's advice is very sound. One thing though, barbed leather
whips just cannot be bought for 50 plat anymore. Neither can Polished Granite
Tomahawks for 250 plat (though that is closer to the market price).

The general price that these are selling for on Karana is something like 100 to
150 for the whips, and 250 to 400 for the tomahawks.

If you can find a lower price on your server, by all means, go for it. :)

Jyzan
